title: 196: Clare’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 3 (Producers Want Us To HATE Clare!)
itunes:title: 196: Clare’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 3 (Producers Want Us To HATE Clare!)
description:
Well here we are, Broads. It is the Episode 3 recap and we finally get a glimpse of our new Bachelorette!! But before that we watch another WILD and weird episode of Clare’s season. First The Broads talk some recent tea (ie. Clare liking tweets/Clare’s #promgate) and then they dive into YOSEF (*no thank you*), Dale coming to the rescue (*hellloooo producers!*), the most awkward group date aka one-on-one makeout session, followed by the second most akward one-on-one aka Zac “Butt Ring”, The Roast, Clare having the ick with all the men minus Dale, the unbelievably heavy handed producer dealings in this season (The Broads won’t let this go), and much more! #thebachelorette


THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:


CANDID: Save $75 on Candid’s starter kit at Candidco.com/chatty and use code: chatty

FRAMEBRIDGE: Go to Framebridge.com and use promo code CHATTY to save an additional 15% off your first order!

STAMPS.COM: Get a special offer that includes a 4-week trial PLUS free postage and a digital scale at Stamps.com - click on the Microphone at the TOP of the homepage and type in CHATTY

FIRST LEAF WINE CLUB: Get 6 bottles of wine for $29.95 – or double the fun with 12 bottles for $59.95 at tryfirstleaf.com/chatty


FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:


Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/

Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/

Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ
